entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Uranium City

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
